name: wl-motae
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3

stmt.origin: syl(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wmo(hs0, wtru))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wmo(hs0, wtru))
-| wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wmo(hs0, wtru))
-| wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wmo(hs0, wtru))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
-| diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| wi(wmo(hs0, wtru), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)))
-| diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))

|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffss(s0, hs0)
-| diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))

|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))
-| diffss(hs0, s0)

|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wmo(hs0, wtru))
-| diffss(s1, hs0)
-| diffsw(s1, wtru)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffss(s1, hs0)
-| diffsw(s1, wtru)

|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffsw(s1, wtru)
-| diffss(hs0, s1)

|- wi(wmo(s0, wtru), wal(s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
-| diffsw(s1, wtru)

comment: Change bound variable. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. Part of Lemma 7 of [KalishMontague] p. 86. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 5-Mar-2023.)
